section.name: Design file
section.p: The design file is the main element of the pipeline. It contains all informations and descriptions of the experiment. It is a simple tabuled plain text file inspired by limma design file. Here a sample of design file:
section.source: SampleNumber Name FileName Genome Annotation GenomicType Condition ReplicateType 1 s1 s1.fq mouse_build37.fasta mouse_build37.gff exon s1 B 2 s2 s2.fq mouse_build37.fasta mouse_build37.gff exon s2 B 3 s3 s1.fq mouse_build37.fasta mouse_build37.gff exon s1 B 4 s4 s2.fq mouse_build37.fasta mouse_build37.gff exon s2 B
section.p: In a design file 3 fields are mandatory:

ul.li: SampleNumber: Numeric, must be unique and >0
Name: Name of the sample. Must be unique
Filename: Path to the reads data. Can be an URL

section.p: User can add any additional field in this file. Some of the optional field are currently used in Eoulsan:

ul.li: Annotation: Annotation of the genome in GFF3 format
GenomicType: Type of annoation to use in the expression module. WARNING: This field will not be used in the next version of the pipeline.
Condition: Condition for the sample in the experiement
ReplicateType: Type of replicate, two values are currently handled: "B" for biological replicate and "T" for technical replicate

section.p: In next version of Eoulsan, compressed files in gzip (.gz) or bzip2 (.bz2) will be handled.
